name: PlayMediaRequest
desc: A request for a media playback queue.

items.name: constraints
items.desc: Limitations on the type and quantity of content the client can receive.

items.name: userActivity
items.desc: A description of the playback queue. Your service provides the UserActivity after it successfully handles a play media intent.

items.name: version
items.desc: The version of the SiriKitMediaAPI library the client uses.
